note: text marked with this highlight are configurable and can be modified in the game's configuration.settings

Object:
The player with the highest score above {{config.winScore}} points on the final round of play wins!

Setup:
Start by adding Players using the `add Player` button.
Use the configuration dialog to set different variations of the game and scoring values.
Once all the Players are set, and game values are agreed on start the game with the `begin game` button

Game Play:
Farkle Scoreboard will promt each player in order. Player rolls 6 dice and chooses which to keep.
Select on the Scoreboard which dice are select to keep the points.

Score:
Only 1's and 5's are by themselves worth points.
  • 1's = 100 points
  • 5's = 50 points
* rolling multiples of 3 or more of a die are worth 100 * die value except 1's.
die triples (3) quadruples (4) sextuple (5) septuple (6)
1 {{scoring( 1000, 3 )}} {{scoring( 1000, 4 )}} {{scoring( 1000, 5 )}} {{scoring( 1000, 6 )}}
2 {{scoring( 200, 3 )}} {{scoring( 200, 4 )}} {{scoring( 200, 5 )}} {{scoring( 200, 6 )}}
3 {{scoring( 300, 3 )}} {{scoring( 300, 4 )}} {{scoring( 300, 5 )}} {{scoring( 300, 6 )}}
4 {{scoring( 400, 3 )}} {{scoring( 400, 4 )}} {{scoring( 400, 5 )}} {{scoring( 400, 6 )}}
5 {{scoring( 500, 3 )}} {{scoring( 500, 4 )}} {{scoring( 500, 5 )}} {{scoring( 500, 6 )}}
6 {{scoring( 600, 3 )}} {{scoring( 600, 4 )}} {{scoring( 600, 5 )}} {{scoring( 600, 6 )}}
'Doubling' scoring on multiples is selected in configuration and points above are adjusted accordingly.

triple-doubles:
any combination of 3 sets of doubles are worth {{config.trippleDoublePoints}} points
example: 2-2-3-3-6-6
all 6 die are then used and the player can roll again, adding to his score if a valid roll.

double-triples:
any combination of 2 sets of triples are worth the "triples (3)" points from table above added
example: 2-2-2-6-6-6 would be 200 + 600 = 800 points
example: 1-1-1-4-4-4 would be 1000 + 400 = 1400 points
all 6 die are then used and the player can roll again, adding to his score if a valid roll.

straight:
1-2-3-4-5-6 is worth {{config.straightPoints}} points
all 6 die are then used and the player can roll again, adding to his score if a valid roll.

If player rolls a Farkle {{config.maxFarkleCount}} times {{config.maxFarklePenality}} point will be deducted from the payer's score.
'maximum Farkles with penality' is selected in configuration
